PSCT.Base: This Special Summoned card cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Divine Dragon Titanomakhia" once per turn. You can banish 3 "Divine Dragon Titanomakhia" from your GY and/or face-up field, including this card on the field; destroy all cards your opponent controls. During the End Phase: You can send cards from the top of your Deck to your GY, equal to the number of Dragon monsters you control.
